This technique was designed by [[Tsunade]] for the purpose of sealing a tailed beast. The technique is performed with four separate scrolls and a sample of blood similar to a [[Summoning Technique]]. Shizune mentioned that good [[chakra]] control and concentration are needed to perform the sealing technique. To use this technique, a scroll is needed to seal the numerous amounts of chakra. This technique was supposed to seal the [[Three-Tails]] in its own dimension, permanently. While sealing the users are vulnerable to enemy attacks. This technique has three stages: 
# "Search": the barrier is erected to locate the target. 
# "Bind": the barrier is then stretched out above the target.
# "Lock": the barrier is lowered and the sealing begins.
